Okou Gnakouri Armand Olivier (French pronunciation: [ɔku *akuʁi aʁmɑ̃ ɔlivje]; amụrụ ya na ụbọchị 30 n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 1980), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha ya bụ Kaaris (/ˈkɑːrɪs/, French: ; stylized as K·RIS), bụ onye amụrụ dịka onye Ivorian ma burukwa onye na rap na French, onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ na onye na-ede egwu
Or Noir, nnukwu abọm ya na Therapy Music / AZ / Universal Music, wepụtara na 21 Ọktoba 2013.
A mụrụ ya na Cocody, nke dị na Abidjan na Ivory Coast, a zụlitere Kaaris na Sevran na ngalaba Seine-Saint-Denis, n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Paris.
Kaaris malitere ịkụ egwu n'afọ 1999, wee wepụta mixtape mbụ ya na 2001
Ọ laghachiri obodo ya bụ Ivory Coast ruo oge ụfọdụ, mana ọ laghachiri France mgbe ọgba aghara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị gachara na mba ahụ
N'afọ 2007, o wepụtara abọm ya n'okporo ámá 43ème Bima (nke a na-akpọ "Quarante-troisième Bima"), nke mere ka ọ bịanye aka na labelụ ọhụrụ French Cut Music.
Otú ọ dị, nzukọ ya na onye egwu French Booba na ndị na-emepụta Therapy nyere ya ndekọ mbụ ya na Booba, "Criminelle league" wepụtara dịka akụkụ nke Booba's Autopsie Vol
Kaaris nwere egwu mbụ ya "Kalash", nke Booba gosipụtara Kaaris pụtara na abọm Booba bụ Futur
Kaaris na-edekọ ọtụtụ n'ime ihe ya na mmekorita ya na ndị na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, nke a maara dị ka Therapy (nke ndị na-emepụta 2031 na 2093 mejupụtara).
Agha dị n'etiti Booba na Kaaris dugara na mmechi nwa oge nke Ụlọ Nzukọ 1 na ọdụ ụgbọ elu Paris-Orly na 1 Ọgọọst n'afọ 2018.
E nyere Kaaris ikpe ọnwa iri na asatọ ma kwụọ ya ụgwọ € 50,000.
